#summary How to create the Source Python Distribution

== How to create the SPD ==

{{{
wget http://sage.math.washington.edu/sage/src/sage-3.4.tar
wget http://spdproject.googlecode.com/files/sage_scripts-3.4.spkg
wget http://spdproject.googlecode.com/files/build_spd
sh build_spd
}}}

This will build spd-0.3.tar.gz. Alternatively, you can download it directly (2MB):
{{{
wget http://spdproject.googlecode.com/files/spd-0.3.tar.gz
}}}

Now follow the [http://code.google.com/p/spdproject/wiki/Installation Installation] howto.
